desc: "Welcome to Art Of Conjuring Magic Store, oldest magic store in Australia. Magic is the 2nd oldest profession in the world, therefore, It's our responsibility to keep the magic alive. Even if you are a beginner or professional we have products and services tailored to you.

layout.text: "SOMETIMES, MAGIC IS JUST SOMEONE SPENDING MORE TIME ON SOMETHING THAN ANYONE ELSE MIGHT REASONABLY EXPECT."
